class.name: WebSocketMultiplayerPeer
class.brief_description: Base class for WebSocket server and client.
class.description: Base class for WebSocket server and client, allowing them to be used as network peer for the [MultiplayerAPI].

method.name: get_peer
method.description: Returns the [WebSocketPeer] associated to the given [code]peer_id[/code].

signal.name: peer_packet
signal.description: Emitted when a packet is received from a peer. Note: this signal is only emitted when the client or server is configured to use Godot multiplayer API.
